## ``%xt%``
%xt%
Simple Crosstabs Operator

#### Description

This operator takes two variables and computes a simple cross tab.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
lhs %xt% rhs
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
* ``lhs``: the left hand side of the operator, a vector
* ``rhs``: the right hand side of the operator, a vector

#### Examples
```{r}
b
x
y
z
=
=
=
=
c(1,0,0,1,1,0,1,1,1,0)
c(1,2,3,2,3,3,1,0,0,0)
rnorm(10)
c("Yes", "No", "Yes", "No", "No", "Yes", "No", "No", "Yes", "No")
factor(x) %xt% factor(b)Index
```
